channel.title: Some random thing I wrote
channel.description: HI, I'M GEORGE ZIMMER, FOUNDER AND CEO OF MEN'S WAREHOUSE. LET ME TELL YOU ABOUT AN ORCHESTRA DIRECTOR WHO AT A CONCERTS DECIDED TO NOT WEAR ONE OF MY INCREDIBLY DAPPER SUITS. THE CONCERT BEGAN, AND HE STARTED WAVING HIS BATON. AT THAT TIME I DECIDED TO GET MY VENGANCE. LIKE BATMAN AFTER STICKING HIS NOCTURNAL NIGHTLIGHT IN CATWOMAN'S CORNUCOPIA I SWOOPED DOWN FROM THE LIGHTING AND GRABBED THE BATON WITH ONE OF MY INCREDIBLY MANLY HANDS. I YANKED IT OUT OF HIS HANDS LIKE A LOLI TAKING CANDY FROM THE HANDS OF A PEDO AND I PROCEEDED TO SHOVE IT INTO HIS RENEGADE RECTUM. HE BENT OVER IN PAIN AND I PROCEEDED TO SNAP THE BATON WHILE IT WAS INSIDE OF HIM, MAKING A PORTION PENETRATE HIS STOMACH. AT THAT POINT, I PULLED OUT MY PELVIC PALADIN AND SHOVED IT THROUGH THE HOLE IN HIS STOMACH. AFTER SEVERAL TYRANNASAURICAL THRUSTS, I DECIDED IT WAS TIME TO START A NEW GREAT FLOOD. THE DISCIPLE MARK WAS TAKING NOTES, AND HIS EYES OPENED AT THE SIGHT OF ME UNLEASHING MY BOISTERIOUS BOY BATTER INTO THE DIRECTOR'S STOMACH. IT OVERFLOWED AND COVERED THE WORLD IN MY MANLY MUFFIN MIXTURE FOR 40 DAYS AND 40 NIGHTS, UNTIL GOD DECIDED IT WAS TIME TO COME DOWN AND GET A PIECE OF IT FOR HIMSELF. HE ATE IT ALL UP, AND THE WORLD WENT BACK TO NORMAL. THE END.

item.title: Some random thing I wrote
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

no thanks
but it was a nice prank

at least you aren’t as bad as this really annoying indian kid
who should jump off a bridge

Read full topic

item.title: Some random thing I wrote
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

There really wasn’t a jew joke,
He was just a random bloke,
I’m royalty like Barbarika;
Here, have a swastika.

item.title: Some random thing I wrote
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

I laughed at the gay preist joke
because lots of them are causing the church to go broke.

I odn’t like jew jokes,
but you aren’t the first bloke
to have made them
go find a hem.

Read full topic

item.title: Some random thing I wrote
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

The lovely young Queen of Bulgaria
Had a cunt that grew hairier and hairier
Till a prince from Peru
Who came down for a screw
Had to hunt for her box with a terrier

There was a young man of Devizes
Who had balls of two different sizes
One was so small
It was no use at all
And the other won several prizes

LoL win plz?

Read full topic

item.title: Some random thing I wrote
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

AFTERMATH FOR PRESIDENT MOD PLS.

your ethusiasm excited me.

i once was gay, like a quire quir quir,
until i met aftermath,
who did suck at math
cuz i laughed at math
and this poem is not a winrar.

Read full topic

item.title: Some random thing I wrote
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

When I was a little boy, once upon a time
To the priest I ventured, with my filthy rhyme
He told me I was sinful, and to fix it I must do:
Hisself, the bellman, a dog, a jew, and his daughter too

Read full topic

item.title: Some random thing I wrote
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Aftermath:

A true poet at heart, no need to throw a dart.
With his rhymes, he makes my cry, I can not lie.
A true man indeed, with a live subscription feed.

Read full topic
